extra.title: Extra
extra.description: A list of additional raw JSON text components to be displayed after this one.

items.description: A child text component. Child text components inherit all formatting and interactivity from the parent component, unless they explicitly override them.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color to render the content in.

font.title: Font
font.description: The resource location of the font for this component in the resource pack within assets/<namespace>/font.

bold.title: Bold
bold.description: Whether to render the content in bold.

italic.title: Italic
italic.description: Whether to render the content in italics. Note that text that is italicized by default, such as custom item names, can be unitalicized by setting this to false.

obfuscated.title: Obfuscated
obfuscated.description: Whether to render the content obfuscated.

insertion.title: Insertions
insertion.description: When the text is shift-clicked by a player, this string is inserted in their chat input. It does not overwrite any existing text the player was writing. This only works in chat messages.

clickEvent.title: Click Event
clickEvent.description: Allows for events to occur when the player clicks on text. Only work in chat messages and written books, unless specified otherwise.

action.title: Action
action.description: The action to perform when clicked.

value.title: Value
value.description: The URL, file path, chat, command or book page used by the specified action.

hoverEvent.title: Hover Event
hoverEvent.description: Allows for a tooltip to be displayed when the player hovers their mouse over text.

action.title: Action
action.description: The type of tooltip to show.

value.title: Value
value.description: The formatting and type of this tag varies depending on the action.

contents.title: Contents
contents.description: The formatting of this tag varies depending on the action.

text.title: Text
text.description: A string containing plain text to display directly. Can also be a number or boolean that is displayed directly.

translate.title: Translate
translate.description: A translation identifier, corresponding to the identifiers found in loaded language files. Displayed as the corresponding text in the player's selected language. If no corresponding translation can be found, the identifier itself is used as the translated text.

with.title: With
with.description: A list of raw JSON text components to be inserted into slots in the translation text.

items.description: A raw JSON text component. If no component is provided for a slot, the slot is displayed as no text.

description: Configuration file defining an advancement for a data pack for Minecraft.

nbt.title: Named Binary Tag
nbt.description: The Named Binary Tag (NBT) data of the item.

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: The type of frame for the icon.

background.title: Background
background.description: The directory for the background to use in this advancement tab (used only for the root advancement).

show_toast.title: Show Toast
show_toast.description: Whether or not to show the toast pop up after completing this advancement.

annouce_to_chat.title: Annouce to Chat
annouce_to_chat.description: Whether or not to announce in the chat when this advancement has been completed.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Whether or not to hide this advancement and all its children from the advancement screen until this advancement have been completed. Has no effect on root advancements themselves, but still affects all their children.

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: The parent advancement directory of this advancement. If this field is absent, this advancement is a root advancement. Circular references cause a loading failure.

criteria.title: Criteria
criteria.description: The required criteria that have to be met.

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: The trigger for this advancement; specifies what the game should check for the advancement.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: All the conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: A list of requirements (all the <criteriaNames>). If all criteria are required, this may be omitted. With multiple criteria: requirements contains a list of lists with criteria (all criteria need to be mentioned). If all of the lists each have any criteria met, the advancement is complete. (basically AND grouping of OR groups)

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.description: The rewards provided when this advancement is obtained.

recipies.title: Recipies
recipies.description: A list of recipes to unlock.

items.description: A namespaced ID for a recipe.

loot.title: Loot
loot.description: A list of loot tables to give to the player.

items.description: A namespaced ID for a loot table.

function.title: Function
function.description: A function to run. Function tags are not allowed.

title: Minecraft Data Pack Advancement
